result.eng: We were sitting on the stairs.
result.ga: Bhí muid inár suí ar an staighre
result.orig: Bhí muid inár suí ar an staighre
result.html: Bhí muid inár suí ar an staighreWe were sitting on the stairs.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí muid inár suí ar an staiġreWe were sitting on the stairs.

result.ga: Cá bhfuil tú i do shuí
result.orig: Cá bhfuil tú i do shuí
result.html: Cá bhfuil tú i do shuíWhere are you sitting?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḃfuil tú i do ẛuíWhere are you sitting?

result.html: D'fhan sé ina shuíHe remained sitting.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan sé ina ẛuíHe remained sitting.

result.html: Níl mé i mo shuíI am not sitting.
result.ponchtml: Níl mé i mo ẛuíI am not sitting.

result.eng: I gave him permission to sit down.
result.ga: Thug mé cead dó suí síos
result.orig: Thug mé cead dó suí síos
result.html: Thug mé cead dó suí síosI gave him permission to sit down.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé cead dó suí síosI gave him permission to sit down.

result.eng: We are seated at the table.
result.ga: Tá muid inár suí ag an tábla
result.orig: Tá muid inár suí ag an tábla
result.html: Tá muid inár suí ag an táblaWe are seated at the table.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid inár suí ag an táblaWe are seated at the table.

result.eng: I have been on my feet since morning.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo shuí ó mhaidin
result.orig: Tá mé i mo shuí ó mhaidin
result.html: Tá mé i mo shuí ó mhaidinI have been on my feet since morning.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ẛuí ó ṁaidinI have been on my feet since morning.

result.html: Tá mé i mo shuíI am sitting.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ẛuíI am sitting.

result.eng: She is sitting in the chair.
result.ga: Tá sí ina suí sa chathaoir
result.orig: Tá sí ina suí sa chathaoir
result.html: Tá sí ina suí sa chathaoirShe is sitting in the chair.
result.ponchtml: Tá sí ina suí sa ċaṫaoirShe is sitting in the chair.

result.eng: There are two bedrooms, a very nice kitchen and a very big sitting room.
result.ga: Tá dhá sheomra codlata ann cistin an-deas agus seomra suí an-mhór
result.orig: Tá dhá sheomra codlata ann cistin an-deas agus seomra suí an-mhór
result.html: Tá dhá sheomra codlata ann cistin an-deas agus seomra suí an-mhórThere are two bedrooms, a very nice kitchen and a very big sitting room.
result.ponchtml: Tá ḋá ẛeomra codlata ann cistin an-deas agus seomra suí an-ṁórThere are two bedrooms, a very nice kitchen and a very big sitting room.

result.ga: Gabh ar d'aghaidh Bí i do shuí
result.orig: Gabh ar d'aghaidh Bí i do shuí
result.html: Gabh ar d'aghaidh Bí i do shuíCome on in. Sit down.
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ ar d'aġaiḋ Bí i do ẛuíCome on in. Sit down.
